verses.verse: וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> happened בְּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> were come דָוִ֧ד <S%H1732><s%> And it came to pass when David וַאֲנָשָׁ֛יו <S%H376><s%> and his men צִֽקְלַ֖ג <S%H6860><s%> to Ziklag בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> on the third וַעֲמָלֵקִ֣י <S%H6003><s%> that the Amalekites פָֽשְׁט֗וּ <S%H6584><s%> had invaded אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on נֶ֙גֶב֙ <S%H5045><s%> the south וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and on צִ֣קְלַ֔ג <S%H6860><s%> and Ziklag וַיַּכּוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and smitten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִ֣קְלַ֔ג <S%H6860><s%> Ziklag וַיִּשְׂרְפ֥וּ <S%H8313><s%> and burned אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> it with fire

וַיִּשְׁבּ֨וּ <S%H7617><s%> captives אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּשִׁ֤ים <S%H802><s%> And had taken the women אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּהּ֙ מִקָּטֹ֣ן <S%H6996><s%> or small וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> either great לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without הֵמִ֖יתוּ <S%H4191><s%> that [were] therein they slew אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> not any וַיִּֽנְהֲג֔וּ <S%H5090><s%> but carried [them] away וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went לְדַרְכָּֽם׃ <S%H1870><s%> on their way

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came דָוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> So David וַֽאֲנָשָׁיו֙ <S%H376><s%> and his men אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> to the city וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold שְׂרוּפָ֖ה <S%H8313><s%> and behold [it was] burned בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <S%H802><s%> and their wives וּבְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1121><s%> and their sons וּבְנֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters נִשְׁבּֽוּ׃ <S%H7617><s%> were taken captives

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> that [were] with him lifted up דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> Then David וְהָעָ֧ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קוֹלָ֖ם <S%H6963><s%> their voice וַיִּבְכּ֑וּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there בָּהֶ֛ם כֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> until they had no more power לִבְכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H1058><s%> to weep

וּשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> two נְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H802><s%> wives דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David's נִשְׁבּ֑וּ <S%H7617><s%> were taken captives אֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <S%H293><s%> Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵלִ֔ית <S%H3159><s%> the Jezreelitess וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <S%H26><s%> and Abigail אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife נָבָ֥ל <S%H5037><s%> of Nabal הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽי׃ <S%H3761><s%> the Carmelite

וַתֵּ֨צֶר <S%H3334><s%> distressed לְדָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> was greatly כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אָמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> spake הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> for the people לְסָקְל֔וֹ <S%H5619><s%> of stoning כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מָ֙רָה֙ <S%H4784><s%> bitter נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> him because the soul כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because [בְּנֹו כ] (בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> afflicted ק) וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because בְּנֹתָ֑יו <S%H1323><s%> and for his daughters וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> encouraged דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> but David בַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> himself in the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> his God ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶבְיָתָ֤ר <S%H54><s%> to Abiathar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֲחִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> Ahimelech's הַגִּֽישָׁה־ <S%H5066><s%> I pray thee bring me hither נָּ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִ֖י הָאֵפֹ֑ד <S%H646><s%> the ephod וַיַּגֵּ֧שׁ <S%H5066><s%> brought אֶבְיָתָ֛ר <S%H54><s%> And Abiathar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> thither the ephod אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> to David

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> enquired דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> And David בַּֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> at the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֶרְדֹּ֛ף <S%H7291><s%> Shall I pursue אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after הַגְּדוּד־ <S%H1416><s%> army הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַֽאַשִּׂגֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5381><s%> for thou shalt surely וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> them? And he answered לוֹ֙ רְדֹ֔ף <S%H7291><s%> him Pursue כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הַשֵּׂ֥ג <S%H5381><s%> overtake תַּשִּׂ֖יג <S%H5381><s%> overtake וְהַצֵּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> [them] and without fail תַּצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> recover

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> So David ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> he and the six מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> that [were] with him and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> to the brook הַבְּשׂ֑וֹר <S%H1308><s%> Besor וְהַנּֽוֹתָרִ֖ים <S%H3498><s%> where those that were left behind עָמָֽדוּ׃ <S%H5975><s%> stayed

וַיִּרְדֹּ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> pursued דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> But David ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> he and four מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> abode behind מָאתַ֣יִם <S%H3967><s%> for two hundred אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who פִּגְּר֔וּ <S%H6296><s%> which were so faint מֵעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> that they could not go over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> the brook הַבְּשֽׂוֹר׃ <S%H1308><s%> Besor

וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <S%H4672><s%> And they found אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> an מִצְרִי֙ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וַיִּקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> and brought אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> him to David וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> and gave ל֥וֹ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> him bread וַיֹּ֔אכַל <S%H398><s%> and he did eat וַיַּשְׁקֻ֖הוּ <S%H8248><s%> and they made him drink מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> And they gave לוֹ֩ פֶ֨לַח <S%H6400><s%> him a piece דְּבֵלָ֜ה <S%H1690><s%> of a cake וּשְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> of figs and two צִמֻּקִים֙ <S%H6778><s%> clusters of raisins וַיֹּ֔אכַל <S%H398><s%> and when he had eaten וַתָּ֥שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> came again רוּח֖וֹ <S%H7307><s%> his spirit אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not אָ֤כַל <S%H398><s%> to him for he had eaten לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> no bread וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or שָׁ֣תָה <S%H8354><s%> nor drunk מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> [any] water שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> and three לֵילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> nights ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֤וֹ דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David לְֽמִי־ <S%H4310><s%> to whom אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וְאֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> and where מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> and he וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him To whom [belongest] thou? and whence [art] thou? And he said נַ֧עַר <S%H5288><s%> I [am] a young man מִצְרִ֣י <S%H4713><s%> of Egypt אָנֹ֗כִי <S%H595><s%> I עֶ֚בֶד <S%H5650><s%> servant לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of an עֲמָֽלֵקִ֔י <S%H6003><s%> Amalekite וַיַּעַזְבֵ֧נִי <S%H5800><s%> left אֲדֹנִ֛י <S%H113><s%> and my master כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when חָלִ֖יתִי <S%H2470><s%> agone I fell sick הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> me because three

אֲנַ֡חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we פָּשַׁ֜טְנוּ <S%H6584><s%> We made an invasion נֶ֧גֶב <S%H5045><s%> [upon] the south הַכְּרֵתִ֛י <S%H3774><s%> of the Cherethites וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and upon [the coast] which [belongeth] to Judah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on נֶ֣גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and upon the south כָּלֵ֑ב <S%H3612><s%> of Caleb וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִקְלַ֖ג <S%H6860><s%> Ziklag שָׂרַ֥פְנוּ <S%H8313><s%> and we burned בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> then דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David הֲתוֹרִדֵ֖נִי <S%H3381><s%> to him Canst thou bring me down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַגְּד֣וּד <S%H1416><s%> to this company הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הִשָּׁבְעָה֩ <S%H7650><s%> Swear לִּ֨י בֵֽאלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> unto me by God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> me nor תְּמִיתֵ֗נִי <S%H4191><s%> that thou wilt neither kill וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or תַּסְגִּרֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H5462><s%> deliver בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> me into the hands אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> of my master וְאוֹרִֽדְךָ֖ <S%H3381><s%> and I will bring thee down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַגְּד֥וּד <S%H1416><s%> band הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וַיֹּ֣רִדֵ֔הוּ <S%H3381><s%> And when he had brought him down וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נְטֻשִׁ֖ים <S%H5203><s%> behold [they were] spread abroad עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> upon all כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth אֹכְלִ֤ים <S%H398><s%> eating וְשֹׁתִים֙ <S%H8354><s%> and drinking וְחֹ֣גְגִ֔ים <S%H2287><s%> and dancing בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַשָּׁלָ֣ל <S%H7998><s%> spoil הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> because of all the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> they לָקְח֛וּ <S%H3947><s%> that they had taken מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וּמֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and out of the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> smote דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David מֵהַנֶּ֥שֶׁף <S%H5399><s%> them from the twilight וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> even unto the evening לְמָֽחֳרָתָ֑ם <S%H4283><s%> of the next day וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נִמְלַ֤ט <S%H4422><s%> and there escaped מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> and not אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> not a man כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אַרְבַּ֨ע <S%H702><s%> of them save four מֵא֧וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> men נַ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> young אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who רָכְב֥וּ <S%H7392><s%> which rode עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <S%H1581><s%> upon camels וַיָּנֻֽסוּ׃ <S%H5127><s%> and fled
